commit.message:
c_locale.cc: Add back <cmath> and <cstdlib>.

2003-10-29  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>

	* config/locale/generic/c_locale.cc: Add back <cmath>
	and <cstdlib>.

	* include/bits/locale_facets.tcc
	(num_get::_M_extract_float): Clean up.

From-SVN: r73036
